= Get support
:url-slack: https://slack.hazelcast.com
:url-stackoverflow: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/hazelcast

If you have a general or technical question, you can use one of the following resources:

- {url-slack}[Slack] For real-time chats with developers and community members
- {url-stackoverflow}[StackOverflow] For technical and troubleshooting questions
